WorkItem.Description:
i am using VS2013 Express for Windows Desktop Version 12.0.21005.1 REL
Microsoft .NET Version 4.5.50938

i installed and updated mvvm light with NuGet and got the version 4.4.32.39728.

this code gives me the error: The type 'EventToCommand' from assembly 'Galasoft.MvvmLight.Extras' is build with an older version of the Blend SDK, and is not supported in a Windows Presentation Framework 4 project. 
```
xmlns:i="clr-namespace:System.Windows.Interactivity;assembly=System.Windows.Interactivity"
xmlns:cmd="clr-namespace:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command;assembly=GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Extras"
...
<i:Interaction.Triggers>
                <i:EventTrigger EventName="Click">
                    <cmd:EventToCommand PassEventArgsToCommand="True"
                                            Command="{Binding TestEventCommand}" />
                </i:EventTrigger>
</i:Interaction.Triggers>
```

the application it self is working, but i the designer is broken (invalid markup).

how can i solve this?

edit: updating VS2013 manually to update 2 solved the issue!
WorkItem.Summary: Design-Time Error: EventToCommand is built with an older version of the blend SDK
